panels.description: "Amount of connections that are not being used and wait to be released by application. Usually it shows incorrect connections management in the application."
panels.title: avg "closewait" connections
Memory Usage (w/o cache) by $app on namespace: $namespace

targets.expr: kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{cluster="$environment", reason="OOMKilled", namespace="$namespace", container=~"^$app"} == 1 and ignoring(reason) kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", container=~"^$app"} -  kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", container="$app"} offset 1m > 0

kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{cluster="$environment", reason="Error", namespace="$namespace", container="$app"} == 1 and ignoring(reason) kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", container=~"^$app"} -  kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", container=~"^$app"} offset 1m > 0
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"^$app-.+", container!="POD", container!="", image!=""}) by (container)
